Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION
REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS
ORDERED TO THIRD READING RULES CAL.814

Title: Authorizes the town of Smithtown assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Tiegerman Community Services, Inc.
Summary: Authorizes the town of Smithtown assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Tiegerman Community Services, Inc. for the 2022-2023 and the 2023-2024 assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town of Smithtown assessor to accept an application for a real property tax exemption from Tiegerman Community Services, Inc.
